review: This is a great device to have in your household if you are looking to move away from cable. With the Sling TV app, you get a very good selection of major cable stations plus news and the ability to watch HBO. I'm also a Prime member so I have easy access to TV shows with the Fire TV. It easily buffers what it thinks you are going to watch so you have instant access to you video. I took one star off because it can be easy to accidentally press the wrong button while watching something and end the video. Also, if you are streaming Sling TV for a few hours, it will go to sleep on you and can be a slight hassle getting back to your channel. Don't buy the Roku when you can get this for less and have virtually the same apps and videos plus its more powerful in hardware.  Easy $40 i ever spent without any regrets. Can't wait to try it out in a hotel!
author: Eric J. Holland "bokeypunk"
